description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Unique time telling method combines sophistication and class with utility. Each bar graph is assigned its own piano octave and therefore visually and audibly represents time changes. The Octave Bar Clock also serves as a fully functional alarm clock.
description.short: Unique time telling method combines sophistication and class with utility. Each bar graph is assigned its own piano octave and therefore visually and audibly represents time changes. The Octave Bar Clock also serves as a fully functional alarm clock.
